participant_abstract.sent: The project manager told us about the new project requirements.
We discussed implementation points in more details (both for industrial design and user interface).
I presented the very first components block-diagram.

participant_actions.sent: I am supposed to carry on with the components concept.

participant_decisions.sent: Decision has been made to go on with the technical staff proposals.
Thanks to the marketing expert, we decided to embed a speech recognition system into the remote control (value-added feature), in order to "jump" directly to the desired channel.

participant_problems.sent: How to get and process the information coming from the TV set, so as to address the content-based navigation problem.
